properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1 v8 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Tandrinundi kaligina ekaika putruni mahima Vale ayana mahimanu kanugontimi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Neevu nammina yedala devuni mahima chutuvu Jeeva punaruddhanamu Yesu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devuni nivaasamu manujulatho nunnadi Nivasinchu devude vaarilo{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mahima prabavamuto makutamu darinchina kristu Thanayulanu thechche mahimaku{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mana rakshana kartanu shramato sampoornuni jeya Mana tandrike thagiyunnadi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mana chulakani shramalu raabovu mahima yeduta ennataginavi kaavu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parishudda pattanamulo devunike mahima Prabhuvunake mahima halleluya{/lang-eng}
